nodes.text: The Force Awakens (French: Le réveil de la force) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The Force Awakens was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on November 8, 2018.

A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away.…
The First Order threatens the peace in the galaxy. To fight it, the Resistance absolutely must find Luke Skywalker, the last Jedi still alive. But Luke might not be the only person who can use the Force…
